content: LOT 1: 2013 LEALANA .10 Bitcoin (BTC) Unloaded .999 silver with BLACK addressSerial #3683 - First Bits - 1BTCF27y*Full public address available and will provided to buyer*1/ estimated 80 - 120 in existence. *Very rare bf black version STARTING BID: 0.000BTCLOT 2: 2016 BTCC Mint One Bitcoin Titanium Coin Redeemedhttps://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/address.dws?1DPb5kM1HSYy5hvqfs5wsLHhZbqXQgmBhn.htmSTARTING BID: 0.000BTC*Comes with original box and COA.LOT 3: 2015 F&D(Finite by Design) Bitcoin brass bar #94/100STARTING BID: 0.000BTC*Comes with COA and and HOLO.STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 26rd, 2023, 19:00:00 EST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC - bc1q8kqwgn6jwsyrw898ec603n79qgyaz3rgjtrxgg SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Lot #1 - 0.004Lot #3 - 0.006PS: Just a detail, there are conflicting rules (I think) - Minimum increment is 0.0001 BTC (four decimal places), while the bids should be limited to 3..?

comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 21, 2023, 06:06:53 AMLot #1 - 0.004Lot #3 - 0.006PS: Just a detail, there are conflicting rules (I think) - Minimum increment is 0.0001 BTC (four decimal places), while the bids should be limited to 3..?why? I mean you could be right - but just because it starts with an amount at 3 decimals does not mean it cant go to 4 is all. Lot#3 - .0065 BTC
